frontmatter.author: Erika Funa
frontmatter.title: Luxembourgish Teachers Experiment with Orange in Nature
frontmatter.shortExcerpt: How can Orange support the needs of teachers and children in the pedagogical process? In Luxembourg, Blaž Zupan and Janez Demšar carried out an experimental workshop with local primary school teachers to test some approaches.
frontmatter.longExcerpt: How can Orange support the needs of teachers and children in the pedagogical process? In Luxembourg, Blaž Zupan and Janez Demšar carried out an experimental workshop with six local primary school teachers to test some approaches. The leaf-teamed session started in the wild and concluded with an interactive reflection and evaluation session.
